title: Zed bug
body:
i am not entirely sure where to post about bugs but hopefully someone from Riot will see this! i have noticed in game as of late (on the oceanic servers) that as {{champion:238}} in particular, AFTER his shadow is gone there is STILL the indicator for his Q, so for example i throw my shadow clone out and throw a shurikan from it, all is well and fine but the shadow disappears and i go to throw a second shurikan the indicator shows two separate indicators. 
sorry if i have explained this poorly. it's not much of a bug but it has affected me in the midst of battle. thanks for all the hard work and great in game features Riot!!
